Subject: Re: Re: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING - PROJECT UPDATES  | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Yas Mall) - [#REQ-1492891]
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Khaled Mostafa,

Ticket: https://onereach.chalhoub.com/helpdesk/tickets/1492891 

Its Noted, 

Could you please provide us with store ID & Merchant ID (MID),

Regards,

	On Fri, 22 Aug 7:15 AM , Khaled wrote: 
	Dear All,

	Project updates. 
	 
	Kindly be informed that we have  Opening of " Penhaligon's Boutique - Yas Mall "The tentative of the unit handover on 20th Sep  and opening date on 25th Sep 2025.
	 
	To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification. 
	 
	Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.  
	 
	@Elaine Petonio <mailto:Elaine.Petonio@chalhoub.com>   please assure that Cleaning service agreement is signed and Pest control agreement is signed.
	 
	@Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>   please ensure that AMC certificate, civile defense certificate is ready.
	 
	@Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  please ensure that Trading license is issued & archived.
	 
	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>   please ensure that CCTV maintenance agreement is signed.
	 
	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please ensure that Cash collection service agreement is signed.

chunks.text:
; Real Emirates Shop Reconciliations ; Retail Accounting ; UAE Leasing ; Rent ; Retail Operations CGR ; Retail Operations UAE 
	Subject: RSO UAE - STORE OPENING | (Penhaligon's Boutique - Yas Mall) 

	Dear All,
	Hope you are doing well,
	 
	Please be informed that we are opening Penhaligon’s Boutique that is going to trade in Yas Mall on tentatively 1st September 2025 TBC.
	 
	We have prepared the Store Opening checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time.
	 
	A Microsoft meeting invitation will be sent shortly to discuss the opening preparations and the assigned tasks, please ensure you attend.
	 
	For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata; 050 815 8454, Khaled Mostafa 050 970 6657 any time.
	 
	All the best, 
	Retail Operations UAE
	 


	Disclaimer
	The information contained in this communication from the sender is confidential. It is intended solely for use by the recipient and others authorized to receive it. If you are not the recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or taking action in relation of the contents of this information is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful.
